commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
# üß† Authintic: AI-Powered Plagiarism Detector

**Authintic** is a comprehensive, full-stack application designed to detect plagiarism in text documents.  
It uses a sophisticated, multi-layered approach that combines:

- A **Node.js backend** for authentication, file management, and database operations  
- A **Python/Flask NLP microservice** for semantic similarity detection  
- A **React frontend** for intuitive user interaction  

This system is built to identify both **direct copy-paste plagiarism** and **advanced paraphrasing** using **sentence-level semantic embeddings** and a **high-speed vector search index**.

---

## üöÄ Technology Stack

**Frontend**
- React  
- Tailwind CSS  
- Axios  
- React Router DOM  

**Backend**
- Node.js  
- Express  
- MongoDB (Mongoose)  
- JWT (Authentication)  
- Multer (File Uploads)  

**NLP Service**
- Python  
- Flask  
- Sentence-Transformers  
- FAISS  
- NLTK  

**External API**
- Google Gemini (AI-powered rewrite suggestions)

---

## üìÅ Project Structure

```

plagiarism-detector-project/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ backend/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ node_modules/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ models/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ middleware/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ routes/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ uploads/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .env                # (CRITICAL: Must be created manually)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ server.js
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ frontend/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ node_modules/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ public/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ AnalysisReport.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ DoughnutChart.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ FileUpload.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Footer.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Header.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ PrivateRoute.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ VisualReport.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pages/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ About.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dashboard.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Home.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Login.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Register.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ routes/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ services/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ App.js
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ tailwind.config.js
‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ nlp-service/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ project/
    ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ __pycache__/
    ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ __init__.py
    ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ loader.py
    ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ main.py
    ‚îÇ
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ source_texts/       # (CRITICAL: Must be created manually)
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ venv/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Dockerfile
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ preprocess_sources.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ requirements.txt
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ run.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ source_data.pkl     # (Generated by preprocess script)
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ source_index.faiss  # (Generated by preprocess script)



````

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup and Installation

Follow these steps carefully.  
You‚Äôll need **three separate terminals** open ‚Äî one for each service.

### üß© Prerequisites

- **Node.js** ‚Üí v18 or later  
- **Python** ‚Üí v3.10 or later  
- **Git** ‚Üí Latest version  
- **MongoDB Atlas** account  
- **Google Gemini API Key** (from [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com))

---

### ü™Ñ Step 1: Clone the Repository

```bash
git clone https://github.com/your-username/your-repo-name.git
cd plagiarism-detector-project
````

---

### üß† Step 2: Set Up the NLP Service (Terminal 1)

> ‚ö†Ô∏è This must be set up **first**, as it generates the required data files.

```bash
cd nlp-service
```

**Create and activate a Python virtual environment:**

**macOS/Linux**

```bash
python3 -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
```

**Windows**

```bash
python -m venv venv
.\venv\Scripts\activate
```

**Install dependencies:**

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

**Create the source text directory:**

```bash
mkdir source_texts
```

Add your `.txt` files (e.g., `article1.txt`, `wikipedia-page.txt`) inside `source_texts/`.

**Run preprocessing:**

```bash
python preprocess_sources.py
```

Once complete, start the Flask server:

```bash
python app.py
```

Your NLP microservice will now run at **[http://localhost:5001](http://localhost:5001)**

---

### üîß Step 3: Set Up the Backend (Terminal 2)

```bash
cd backend
npm install
```

**Create the `.env` file:**

```bash
touch .env
```

Add the following inside:

```
MONGO_URI=your_mongodb_atlas_connection_string
JWT_SECRET=thisisastrongsecretkeyforyourproject
GEMINI_API_KEY=your_google_gemini_api_key
```

**Run the backend:**

```bash
node server.js
```

Backend runs at **[http://localhost:5000](http://localhost:5000)**

---

### üíª Step 4: Set Up the Frontend (Terminal 3)

```bash
cd frontend
npm install
npm start
```

Your React app should open automatically at **[http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)**

You can now register, log in, and upload documents for analysis üéâ

---

## üßæ Summary

| Service  | Port | Tech Stack                    |
| -------- | ---- | ----------------------------- |
| Frontend | 3000 | React + Tailwind              |
| Backend  | 5000 | Node.js + Express + MongoDB   |
| NLP API  | 5001 | Flask + Sentence-Transformers |

---

## ü§ù Contributing

Pull requests are welcome!
For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you‚Äôd like to modify or improve.

---

## ü™™ License

This project is released under the **MIT License** ‚Äî free for personal and educational use.

---

### üí° Developed by [Jay Patil](https://github.com/thisisjaypatil8)
